response.original_title: Too Many Nights: The Images of Bob Carlos Clarke
response.overview: His striking and provocative portraits of female sensuality made Bob Carlos Clarke one of Britain's most successful shutterbugs. This seductive slideshow unspools Clarke's photographs -- sans narrative accompaniment -- for up to eight and a half hours (with the viewer setting the time intervals and number of images). With the flick of a switch, your living room will morph into an erotic art gallery.
response.title: Too Many Nights: The Images of Bob Carlos Clarke
